Kactus for Jekyll

June 11, 2015

Cactus is a fast, easy and free static site generator, kinda like Jekyll but made to run on your mac. It features a good, simple and modern template. I really like Cactus default simple theme and I wanted to port it to Jekyll. The result is Kactus.

Here's a list of what kactus currently includes:

  • Pagination
  • Rss feed
  • Google Analytics Tracking code
  • Code Syntax Highlight
  • Author's profile with picture header
  • Twitter/Facebook share buttons
  • Archive posts list under each post
  • Disqus comments

Screenshots

Here you can find a couple of screenshots.

Feel free to fork the repository, the source code is on github.

Nick Balestra Software engineer
